data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Grad Sofiya to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grad Sofiya, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Grad Sofiya.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 50 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Grad Sofiya, Bulgaria that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Grad Sofiya, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Yoruk people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Grad Sofiya to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Grad Sofiya, Bulgaria.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Grad Sofiya to agree with you and with one another.
